verbose_text: IFT25 depletion in IFT25 miRNA cells caused a dramatic reduction of IFT27 protein to a level of as low as ~ 7% of wild-type level (XREF_FIG A, B), and a significant increase in IFT27 mRNA to a level of as high as ~ 133% of wild-type level (XREF_FIG C), indicating that cells respond to the loss of IFT27 protein by increasing IFT27 transcript level.
evidence: loss of IFT27 protein by increasing IFT27
